attributes.action: intervene in the Haringey Social Services investigation into the torture and death of "baby P" to ensure the doctor who didn't notice that the baby had a broken back and ribs is disciplined sufficiently by being sacked. Clearly others within the council partaking and overseeing the 60, yes 60!, visits to the baby's home need a new career.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
